hero.description: A Saudi company that supplies and executes all project requirements for tools, equipment, and human resources.

service.title: Service Title Here
service.desc: More details about the selected service will be displayed here.

register.services_placeholder: Mention the services or supplies your company offers

pricing.form_desc: Fill out the form to request a price quote.
pricing.details_placeholder: Enter details of materials/services required for pricing

transport.form_desc: Enter equipment and driver data for registration.
transport.location_placeholder: The city where the equipment is located

hr.form_desc: Please accurately fill out the form for personnel request and recruitment.

reports.form_desc: Specify the report type and required time period.
reports.scope_placeholder: Mention the departments or projects you want covered

business.form_desc: We will create a live viewing channel for your daily or weekly business operations.
business.project_placeholder: Enter the project or activity name
business.scope_label: Scope of Work to be Monitored
business.scope_placeholder: Specify the operations or teams that require monitoring

exec_review.form_desc: A form to request a formal price quote from the company for a specific service or supply.
exec_review.details_placeholder: Enter a list of required services or products and their specifications

archive.desc: A schedule of the tasks required to be performed by the external company

supplier_reg.title: Supplier Registration
supplier_reg.description: This table is used to register a new supplier
supplier_reg.modal_content: The supplier registers all their information and submits it to us, after which they are granted a username and password to log in upon approval.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Send a pricing request and handle all pricing matters
pricing.modal_content: **Details for Card 2:** The pricing service involves creating a professional Request for Quotation (RFQ) and sending it to specialized suppliers. A strict deadline for response is set, followed by a comparative price analysis to ensure the selection of the best offer in terms of cost and quality.

transport.img_default: Default image for transport and equipment service
transport.img_hover: Hover image for transport and equipment service
transport.title: Transport & Equipment
transport.description: A table is created to register equipment, type, year of manufacture, location, and driver's ID
transport.modal_content: **Details for Card 3:** This service focuses on archiving and tracking your physical assets. Each piece of equipment is registered with a serial number, type, date of manufacture, current geographic location, in addition to being linked to the responsible driver or operator's ID card.

hr_request.title: HR Request
hr_request.description: The form must be completed in full and data verified by the employee
hr_request.modal_content: **Details for Card 4:** A standardized form is used to collect all required personal and professional data for the worker (profession, location, type of work). This procedure aims to facilitate the recruitment and filtering process and provide a complete record of the working human resources.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Create a comprehensive report on all works and link them to one channel
reports.modal_content: **Details for Card 5:** We offer a comprehensive and unified reporting service. Data is collected from various departments and linked in a single viewing channel (Dashboard) to provide an integrated and easily analyzable view of all the establishment's work.

business.img_default: Default image for business and monitoring service
business.img_hover: Hover image for business and monitoring service
business.title: Business
business.description: Create a channel to view all daily or weekly work closely
business.modal_content: **Details for Card 6:** We provide a platform (channel) that allows you to directly and accurately follow all executed work, whether daily or weekly. The goal is to enhance transparency and facilitate the process of auditing and remote monitoring.

rfq.title: Request for Quotation
rfq.description: If a quote is requested from the company, requests are sent in this group and the form is used
rfq.modal_content: **Details for Card 7:** Requests for Quotation (RFQ) are directed to this service, where the official form is received from the client to provide a suitable and documented price quote.

archive.title: Archive
archive.description: Searches for all items and company works...
archive.modal_content: **Details for Card 9:** An advanced service for searching and digging into the company's archive. It allows you to quickly find any old item, document, or work record, facilitating the auditing process and reducing the time spent on information retrieval.

vision.img_alt: We make requests easy for you
vision.main_title: We Make Requests Easy for You
vision.our_vision_text: To be the primary partner in supplying your project needs.

why_takamul.feature1_desc: We work with government and private entities, meeting every client's needs.
why_takamul.feature2_desc: A registered and official company that guarantees your rights and dealings.
why_takamul.feature3_desc: Our team includes expert engineers and consultants with local and international market experience.
why_takamul.feature4_desc: We use accredited evaluation standards to ensure reliable results.

contact.service_select_label: Select the service you would like to inquire about

footer.description: A Saudi company that supplies all project needs for tools, equipment, and human resources
